caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. DAVID ARLIN TAYES, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from the Superior Court for Pierce County, No. 96-1-02166-2, Arthur W. Verharen, J., entered May 22, 1997.
